thread.title: Sri Lanka Tourism targeting 75,000 travelers from Australia
thread.title_full: Sri Lanka Tourism targeting 75,000 travelers from Australia

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Sri Lanka Tourism targeting 75,000 travelers from Australia
text:
Sri Lanka Tourism targeting 75,000 travelers from Australia Adv: 
Jul 28, 2015 Adv: 
Sri Lanka Tourism focussing on the top ten source markets for Sri Lanka embarked on the key market- Australia, by staging a road show in Melbourne and then at the Sydney a Travel and Tourism Fair. 
"We are targeting 75,000 visitors," said Chairman Sri Lanka a Tourism Dr Rohantha Athukorala. 
As at first half of the year Australia registered 27,134 visitors to Sri Lanka with a growth of 8.7% year on year.
